attributes.action: Reverse Gov't Plans and Save Jodrell Bank Observatory From Closure
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: recently it has been reported that the gov't plans to stop its funding of Jodrell Bank Observatory, which would undoubtable cause its closure. This petition is to prevent this happening and keep jodrell at the forfront of the merlin project and british space exploration.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Reverse Gov't Plans and Save Jodrell Bank Observatory From Closure."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page17123


Prime Minister's Office
